info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: Showers and thunderstorms move northeastward across southwest, central and portions of north central Montana, this afternoon and evening. These storms are forecast to produce frequent lightning, strong erratic gusty winds of 40 mph or greater, localized heavy downpours and small hail. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. When thunder roars, go indoors!
